messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] silly putty
messages.messageBody:
>From: mc1mommy@...

<<Turn over the card that the egg of silly putty comes in and you'll be
surprised (?) to find out that silly putty is not recommended for use as
earplugs. Really.>>


I've wondered why since Christmas the kids don't seem to hear me anymore!!
<BG>

Mary B

messages.subject: silly putty
messages.msgSnippet: ... With all the lawsuits being brought against companies, I ve noticed that many products now have warnings on them that border on the ridiculous.  For my own
messages.messageBody:
> Just in case anyone ever needs to know. Rubbing alcohol will take Silly
> Putty out of the rug and also clothes. Works like a charm.
>
>

With all the lawsuits being brought against companies, I've noticed that many
products now have warnings on them that border on the ridiculous. For my own
amusement, I've taken to reading the packaging on many products. Turn over
the card that the egg of silly putty comes in and you'll be surprised (?) to
find out that silly putty is not recommended for use as earplugs. Really.
Mary J


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
